Desc.entry: Society for current and past residents of Dore. A registered charity which fosters the protection and enhancement of the local environment and amenities within Dore, encourages a spirit of community and records its historic development. Researches and records living history. Holds Dore Show annually on 2nd Saturday in September and publishes a quarterly magazine.

Pubs.entry: Dore to Door, magazine; Occasional historical booklets; Christmas cards and notelets

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Sat in the month 10am-12noon, last Tues in the month at 7.30pm
